data.name: ApiReplacements_CodeFix
data.value: Replace with '{0}'.

data.name: ApiReplacements_Description
data.value: {0} should not be used. Use {1} instead.
data.comment: 0 - member name, 1 - good type, 2 - current source type

data.name: ApiReplacements_MessageFormat
data.value: {1} is accessed directly from {0}.

data.name: ApiReplacements_Title
data.value: {0} should not be used. Use {1} instead.

data.name: WhereLikeMethod_Description
data.value: Consider using one of 'WhereStartsWith()', 'WhereEndsWith()' or 'WhereContains()' methods instead.

data.name: WhereLikeMethod_MessageFormat
data.value: Method '{1}' should not be used.

data.name: WhereLikeMethod_Title
data.value: Method 'WhereLike()' or 'WhereNotLike()' should not be used used.

data.name: EventLogArguments_Description
data.value: LogEvent called with event type '{0}', use 'EventType.{1}' instead.
data.comment: {0} - called with, {1} - to be called with

data.name: EventLogArguments_MessageFormat
data.value: LogEvent called with event type '{0}'.

data.name: EventLogArguments_Title
data.value: LogEvent should not be called with hardcoded event type.

data.name: HttpRequestUserHostAddress_Description
data.value: 'Request.UserHostAddress' property is used. Use 'RequestContext.UserHostAddress' instead.

data.value: '{0}.{1}' should not be used. Use 'RequestContext.UserHostAddress' instead.

data.name: HttpRequestUserHostAddress_Title
data.value: 'Request.UserHostAddress' should not be used.

data.name: HttpRequestAndResponseCookie_Description

data.value: 'HttpCookie' should not be used accessed directly. Use 'CookieHelper.ResponseCookies' or 'CookieHelper.RequestCookies' instead.
